channel.title: lbaas on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in lbaas on SoftLayer API

item.title: LBaaS Examples
item.description: This example covers a variety of API calls that you might want to use when interacting with the Load Balancer as a Service offering. General information about this service can be found on the Load Balancer as a Service Documentation """ Manages LBaaS instances. This sample shows how to use a variety of the common methods when working with LBaaS instances. This example is more a proof of concept to show basically how it all works, and not really intended to be used as is.
